name: Twin Striker
description: Twin Striker is a melee DPS class equipped with two powerful axes. A class which deals constant damage and has skills which keep them alive as long as they deal damage.The class will have a combo meter that awards the character bonus damage for every successful attack. Combo meter is X%/130% bonus damage.
quote: A close-range class that unleashes a fierce, continuous attack with two axes.

basicSkills.name: Beast Swing
basicSkills.description: Chain attack, the 4th attack deals additional damage and applies a damage reduction debuff on the enemy.

basicSkills.name: Axe Tornado
basicSkills.description: Shielding skill to block incoming damage until Endurance hits “0”. You can activate counter mode by clicking Left Click while holding up the shield.

tacticalSkills.name: Brutal Blow
tacticalSkills.description: Launch a rotating slash attack in a wide area in front of you.
